rewrite1:
Please proceed with the following modifications to the eighth paragraph of your Word document:

- Change the font style to Calibri Light.
- Set the spacing before the paragraph to one line for a cleaner look.
- Reduce the font size to 48 points to match the desired emphasis.
- Align the text to the right for a polished layout.
- Alter the line spacing to Double for improved readability.
- Apply a highlight color using the hex code #0000FF to make it stand out effectively.
